fn.p: Citation Green LR, Al-Rubaiawi AA, Al-Maeni MARM, Harrison OB, Blades M, Oldfield NJ, Turner DPJ, Maiden MCJ, Bayliss CD. 2020. Localized hypermutation is the major driver of meningococcal genetic variability during persistent asymptomatic carriage. mBio 11:e03068-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/mBio.03068-19.
